turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need to order a drink from Peet's on 17th Street in Washington DC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a sugar-free vanilla latte. Large, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a large sugar free vanilla latte with whole milk to be picked up at the pete's on 17th street in washington dc, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and it should be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
